verbose_text: To confirm the effects of mangiferin on beta-cell proliferation via the regulation of p16 INK4a, islet cells of adult and aged mice were isolated and cultured in the presence of mangiferin or vehicle (dimethyl sulfoxide) (XREF_FIG); furthermore, the p16 INK4a gene was knocked down in the isolated islet cells of the aged mice (XREF_FIG) and p16 INK4a was overexpressed in the isolated islet cells of the adult mice (XREF_FIG).
